content.question: A student is developing a class that will store information about pets, including each pet’s name and age. Which of the following sets of attributes is most appropriate for this class?

choices.label: One  String  attribute that includes the pet’s name and age
One  String  attribute for the pet’s name and one  String  attribute for the pet’s age
One  String  attribute for the pet’s name and one  int  attribute for the pet’s age
One  int  attribute for the pet’s name and one  int  attribute for the pet’s age

content.answer: One  String  attribute for the pet’s name and one  int  attribute for the pet’s age

skill.text: 1.A: Determine an appropriate program design to solve a problem or accomplish a task.
